product_details.name: Dior Sauvage EDP - Unleash Your Wild Sophistication
product_details.description:
• Authentic luxury eau de parfum by Christian Dior
• Sophisticated dark blue glass bottle with elegant design
• Long-lasting fragrance with exceptional sillage
• Premium quality concentrated perfume formula
• Perfect blend of fresh and woody notes
• Signature scent suitable for day and evening wear
• Comes in a sleek, modern packaging
• Made in France - guaranteed authenticity
• Ideal gift choice for special occasions
• Available in multiple size options

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, dark-themed design centered around a premium fragrance product. The header, identified by "heading", uses a clean, futuristic sans-serif font in white to deliver a bold brand title. Beneath it, the "tagline" text layer in soft blue-gray reinforces the product's identity with a strong and sophisticated message. A high-quality image of the fragrance bottle, marked by "product_image", sits prominently in the center, flanked by vertical decorative lines for symmetry. The "price" text layer in bright white offers strong contrast, making the pricing pop. A bold rectangular button element with a blue background titled "cta_background" frames the "cta" text, encouraging immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy: #09111F (background)
- Deep Blue: #0D1A33, #132648, #1B3666 (layered circular gradients)
- Accent Blue: #3D68B1 (decorative elements, CTA button)
- Soft Blue-Gray: #A3B4D9 (tagline)
- White: #FFFFFF (text and highlights)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and masculine aesthetic, with a luxurious blend of deep and electric blues transitioning into black, creating a bold and elegant gradient. The colors combine subtly yet powerfully, enhancing the premium appeal of the perfume bottle. The text is sharply highlighted in stark white, standing out crisply against the dark background for high contrast and readability. This creates a striking visual focus. A suitable advertisement banner could use this color palette: Midnight Black (#0A0A0A), Royal Blue (#1A2D66), Electric Blue (#0072F5), and Crystal White (#FFFFFF). These tones maintain the sophisticated, intense, and alluring brand message.
